title: 01/17/23: News - changes to past timesheets available
content: You can now make changes to past timesheets (dated before the current pay period).Thus, it will be possible to change a timesheet from 3 months ago and generate the payroll.Please note that the manipulations made are not submitted in the payroll automatically.It is also possible that depending on your payroll system, information that is too old is not accepted.If this option interests you, do not hesitate to open a ticket.Helpful?00Updated: 1 year ago Share :
